1.speaker: A
sentence: Can you help me with my math homework?
너는 나를 도와줄 수 있니 내 수학 숙제를?

2.speaker: B
sentence: Sorry. I can't. My hands are full.

3.speaker: A
sentence: Math tests are not what they used to be.

4.speaker: B
sentence: What can i say? You have to get used to it.

5.speaker: A
sentence: Math is not my thing. but English is my favorite.
수학은 내 취향이 아니야. 하지만 영어는 애가 좋아하는 거야.

6.speaker: B
sentence: If so, You should play to your strengths.
그렇다면. 너 해봐 너의 강점을 발휘.
